price: (41) And We made them leaders[1105] inviting to the Fire, and on the Day of Resurrection they will not be helped.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ أَئِمَّةٗ يَدۡعُونَ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِۖ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ لَا يُنصَرُونَ
footnotes: [1105]- i.e., examples or precedents, followed by subsequent tyrants.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnāhum a-immatan yadʿūna ilā al-nāri wayawma al-qiyāmati lā yunṣarūna
